judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed on the unanimous opinion of the learned Orphans’ Court of Philadelphia County.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Walter Y. Anthony, Jr., and Rowland C. Evans, Jr., with them Erusen, Evwns & Shaw, for appellants.
John Earper, with him Irvin E. Campbell and Ear-per, Buchanan & Driver, for appellees.
